mdRecord.dcterms:title: Church pump organ from the Harvestwood Church
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Church pump organ from the no longer standing Harvestwood Church. Mrs. Thelma Turner Houchins played the organ for many years. Pumping the foot pedals forced air over the free-floating reeds to made the musical notes. The faster the pumping, the louder the sound.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Music
Musical instruments
Organ (Musical instrument)
Reed organ
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
